item.description:
***2013 Rock-N-Dock Festival***

June 1 DOWN SYNDROME BENEFIT CONCERT
The Lori McKenna Band
Ticket Price: $45
Showcase Live at Patriot Place, Foxboro, MA

May 30 - June 2 ROCK-N-DOCK FESTIVAL
Dockdogs Worldwide Competition
Free to the public
Bass Pro Shops at Patriot Place, Foxboro, MA

Benefit concert tickets on sale Wednesday January 16

Dockdogs open registration Wednesday January 16

It is just about SHOWTIME! Tickets for the Rock-N-Dock Festival benefit concert featuring Nashville recording artist, Lori McKenna, will go on sale on Wednesday January 16. Last years concert sold out quickly. If you plan on attending, please support Team 21's mission to help kids with Down syndrome and get your tickets early. 650 tickets will be available and it will sell out.

Dockdogs open registration will be available on Wednesday January 16. We are expecting teams from across the country as well as our friends in Canada to support our cause.

We will post links to guide you for purchase of benefit concert tickets and Dockdogs registration.

Please share widely and Team 21 thanks you all for supporting our mission to help kids with Down syndrome.

THANK YOU!
item.name: 2013 Rock-N-Dock Festival! (Dockdogs!)
